bayou.http

Interface CookieStorage


  • public interface CookieStorage
    Cookie storage for HttpClient. See HttpClientConf.cookieStorage(CookieStorage).

    Before sending a request, HttpClient calls getCookies(HttpRequest); after receiving the response, HttpClient calls setCookies(HttpRequest, HttpResponse).

    • Method Summary

      Abstract Methods
      Async<List<Cookie>> getCookies(HttpRequest request)
      Get the cookies that should be sent with the request.
      Async<Void> setCookies(HttpRequest request, HttpResponse response)
      Save the cookies carried in the response.
      Static Method
      CookieStorage newInMemoryStorage()
      Create a new instance of an in-memory implementation of CookieStorage.

    • Method Detail

      • getCookies

        Async<List<Cookie>> getCookies(HttpRequest request)
        Get the cookies that should be sent with the request.

      • setCookies

        Async<Void> setCookies(HttpRequest request,
                       HttpResponse response)
        Save the cookies carried in the response.

      • newInMemoryStorage

        static CookieStorage newInMemoryStorage()
        Create a new instance of an in-memory implementation of CookieStorage.
